CoMBoZo is Pleased to offer special deals on:

* [VPS Hosting](https://www.combozo.com/hosting/vps-hosting/)

<center>![](https://www.combozo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/REDLOGO.png)</center>


Combozo was formed in November 2013 as plu9.com company then moved to " Combozo.com " and we are still in business since we started in 2013, if you are looking for quality services then combozo delivers, our servers in **Phoenix, AZ** ( united states ) on 1gb network and high server specs, We are always looking to improve our services, We offer cheap, fast and reliable hosting for our clients.


### All packages Come with:

* SoluvVM Control Panel
* Ability to manage Vps's through client area
* SSD Storage
* Install Centos, Debian, Ubtenu, etc ..
* Purchase IP's (Available on request)


------------------------------------

$2.99 /mo OR
$15 /year ( Coupon Code: 15YEAR )
